description: This file defines API endpoints for health checks in a FastAPI application, including liveness, readiness, and MongoDB connectivity status.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Response schema indicating overall health status, including service identifier.

classes.name: DbHealthResponse
classes.description: Response schema for MongoDB connectivity status, including duration and error info.

methods.name: healthz
methods.description: Liveness check endpoint indicating if the service is running.

methods.name: readyz
methods.description: Readiness check endpoint, potentially to include more checks in the future.
